name: Valkyrius Prime
description: Fight through countless enemies and hulking bosses in this indie shoot-'em-up! Teleport to dodge enemy fire, then counter with an assortment of powerful weapons. Valkyrius Prime features all new character art and story, plus many more improvements over the original.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Duo T2300E / 1.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel GMA 950 Storage: 375 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-2410M or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 545 GDDR5 or better Storage: 380 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card required Additional Notes: Gamepad required for 2 player mode. Windows Media Player required.
